modules.title: RESEARCH
modules.description: To conduct and coordinate research into the biology, management and conservation of the koala.

modules.title: FUND
modules.description: To raise and direct funds for koala research, management and conservation

modules.title: COLLABORATE
modules.description: To foster collaboration between scientists undertaking koala research.

modules.title: LEAD
modules.description: To provide national leadership in the development and implementation of strategies for the sustainable management of koalas and their habitat.

modules.title: UNDERSTAND
modules.description: To understand the relationship between koalas and the community.

modules.title: CONNECT
modules.description: To establish and grow long term relationships with supporters of koala research.

modules.title: EDUCATE
modules.description: To educate the community, koala welfare and other interest groups about koala management and conservation in the wild and captivity.
